Text: is the alien language subbed solo from the english? biggest problem with the rips of this movie is there is generally no hard code for the alien so you can only get alien to english text in subs that cover the entire movie.

this file will display english subtitles for the alien language only.... known as forced subtitles:

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4111431/stargate-en
